T02bsu027_u:3: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ |
T02bsu027_u:5: pratītyasamutpādasya vo bhikṣavaḥ ādiṃ vo deśayiṣyāmi vibhaṅgaṃ ca |
T02bsu027_u:6: tacchṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta, bhāṣiṣye -
T02bsu027_u:7: pratītyasamutpādasya ādiḥ katamaḥ? yaduta asmin sati idaṃ bhavati,
T02bsu027_u:20: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati |
T02bsu027_u:22: vibhaṅgaḥ katamaḥ? avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ ityavidyā katamā? yat pūrvānte 'jñānam, aparānte 'jñānam, pūrvāntāparānte 'jñānam,
T02bsu027_u:26: 'jñānam, hetāvajñānam, hetusamutpanneṣu dharmeṣvajñānam, kuśalākuśaleṣu sāvadyānavadyeṣu sevitavyāsevitavyeṣu
T02bsu027_u:28: ṣaṭsu vā punaḥ sparśāyataneṣu yathābhūta(tā?)saṃprativedhaḥ iti |
T02bsu027_u:29: yadatra tatra yathābhūtasyājñānam, adarśanam, anabhisamayaḥ, tamaḥ, saṃmohaḥ,
T02bsu027_u:31: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ katame? trayaḥ saṃskārāḥ - kāyasaṃskārāḥ vāksaṃskārāḥ manaḥsaṃskārā iti ||
T02bsu027_u:32: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānamiti vijñānaṃ katamat? ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ -
T02bsu027_u:34: vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti nāma katamat? catvāra arūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ |
T02bsu027_u:37: rūpaṃ katamat? yat kiṃcidrūpam, sarvaṃ tat catvāri
T02bsu027_u:39: catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāya itīdaṃ ca nāma,
T02bsu027_u:44: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa iti sparśaḥ katamaḥ? ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ |
T02bsu027_u:46: (Psvibh, Vaidya 118) sparśapratyayā vedaneti vedanā katamā? tisro vedanāḥ |
T02bsu027_u:52: upādānapratyayo bhava iti bhavaḥ katamaḥ? trayo bhavāḥ |
T02bsu027_u:54: bhavapratyayā jātiriti jātiḥ katamā? yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye jātiḥ saṃjātiravakrāntirabhirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ skandhapratilambho dhātupratilambhaḥ āyatanapratilambhaḥ skandhānāmabhinirvṛttiḥ jīvitendriyasya prādurbhāvaḥ ||
T02bsu027_u:55: jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti jarā katamā? yattat khālatyaṃ pālityaṃ
T02bsu027_u:56: valīpracuratā jīrṇatā bhugnatā kubjagopānasīvaṅkatā tilakālakācitagātratā khuapraśvāsakāyatā purataḥ prāgbhārakāyatā daṇḍaviṣkambhaṇatā dhandhatvaṃ mandatvaḥ hāniḥ parihāṇiḥ indriyāṇāṃ paripākaḥ paribhedaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ purāṇībhāvaḥ jarjarībhāvaḥ |
T02bsu027_u:58: maraṇaṃ karamat? yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmāttasmāt sattvanikāyāt
T02bsu027_u:59: cyutiḥ cyavanato bhedaḥ antarahāṇiḥ āyuṣo hāṇiḥ uṣmaṇo hāṇiḥ jīvitendriyasya nirodhaḥ skandhānāṃ nikṣepaḥ maraṇaṃ kālakriyā |
T02bsu027_u:61: idaṃ ca maraṇa pūrvikā ca jarā,
T02bsu027_u:64: pratītyasamutpādasyādiṃ vo deśayiṣyāmi iti vibhaṅgaṃ ca iti vo yaduktam, tadetat pratyuktam
